definitions.definition: Characterized by aggression ; highly combative ; prone to behave in a way that involves attacking (especially if unjustly ) or arguing .
examples: an aggressive policy, war, person, nation

definitions.definition: Exploiting every opportunity to be applied.
definitions.label_groups: especially programming , of a method or process

definitions.definition: That spreads quickly or extensively; virulent ; malignant .
definitions.label_groups: pathology , of a tumour or disease

definitions.definition: Involving high risk for potentially high reward .
examples: an aggressive stock; an aggressive portfolio

definitions.definition: Female but having a male or masculine gender presentation: butch .

main_definition: Characterized by aggression ; highly combative ; prone to behave in a way that involves attacking (especially if unjustly ) or arguing .
secondary_definitions: ( especially programming , of a method or process ) Exploiting every opportunity to be applied.
( pathology , of a tumour or disease ) That spreads quickly or extensively; virulent ; malignant .
( finance ) Involving high risk for potentially high reward .
( US , LGBTQ , Black lesbian slang ) Female but having a male or masculine gender presentation: butch .
